DOC.brief_summary: Abstract Introduction Bystander cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) double patient 's chance survival Out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) . In Singapore , bystander CPR rate low . Recent study propose validate use popular song aid perform CPR . These song may widely know applied different population , , may lose popularity time . `` Count Singapore '' ( COMS ) believe know 90 % Singapore population . Pilot data indicate CPR perform use COMS mental metronome ( COMSCPR ) achieve guideline-compliant rate chest compression low fatigue level CPR guide conventional `` one-and-two-three-and '' ( Standard CPR ) . The investigator hypothesize COMSCPR non-inferior Standard CPR achieve guideline-compliant rate chest compression . Methodology The investigator plan prospective , randomize , crossover non-inferiority trial compare COMS CPR Standard CPR . 80 eligible volunteer recruit convenience sample camp personnel military training camp . After 15 minute familiarization session , randomize two group ( A B ) . Group A proceed perform one cycle ( two minute ) Standard CPR , group B proceed perform one cycle COMS CPR . participant cross perform one cycle method CPR . After complete second cycle , survey form administer . The Laerdal SkillReporter use measure CPR perform . After 7-14 day interval , participant recall attend test scenario . Statistical analysis use compare two arm .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Culture-specific Popular Music Mental Metronome Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: All volunteer eligible . This mimic real world situation trained member public provide bystander CPR . Lack informed consent Existing medical condition may cause danger participant ( e.g . cardiac condition musculoskeletal injury ) Recent CPR course attend ( within past one month )
